minemusic.styleButtonTooltip: Defines how the current song information is displayed
minemusic.layoutButtonTooltip: Select which information will be shown
minemusic.bossbarStyleTooltipText: Displays the song in the bossbar.
minemusic.overlayStyleTooltipText: Shows song info in the top left corner.
minemusic.chatMessageStyleTooltipText: Sends song info in the chat.
minemusic.logoutText: Do you want to log out of your account?
minemusic.coverImageButtonTooltipWarning: Only available with the Overlay style.
